bug.author: ijrsvt
bug.summary: [core] Repeated warning about Worker log file creation
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
On ray.init(), I get the following printed 16 times (one per worker it looks like). <denchmark-code>(pid=<XXXX>) Could not create log file: File exists (pid=<XXXX>) COULD NOT CREATE LOGFILE '20200621-222001.<XXXX>'! </denchmark-code>
Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): Python: 3.6.10 OS: MacOS 10.15.5 Latest Ray version (06/21/2020) <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
